jump_scares.spoiler: One of the captives gets dragged away suddenly
A man with a disfigured face comes up from behind the woman
A man’s face turns to a skeleton
The man with the crow mask’s face distorts with a loud sound in the background
Some kids throw eggs at the house and they suddenly splatter at the window
A door suddenly slams
An alien creature appears in front of the camera
The alien finds the woman hiding
The clown runs out from the side of the gas station
The clown appears in front of the woman’s car window
The woman turns the driver over to see that it’s a man with a severely disfigured face
The woman raises her head to see the clown right in front of her
The video suddenly zooms in on the clown’s face
Child suddenly suffocated
Cutting of an abdomen and Human organ manipulation
Threading needles into lips and mouth
Sudden unzipping of abdomen
Quick camera close up of cutting into side of foot and bone
Two sudden drills pulled out and drilling to the head
A dog lunges at the window of Rocky’s side of the car
Money calls out “done” loudly during a quiet scene
The blind man suddenly shoots Money
The blind man comes into view as he walks down a hallway
There is a loud bang
As Rocky approaches a door, the blind man suddenly opens it from the other side
A mobile phone vibrates during a tense scene
A tied up girl lunges at Rocky from behind
The blind man appears on the other side of the cellar door as Alex opens it
There is a loud gunshot and the dark room is briefly illuminated (another gunshot occurs at 49:38)
A hand reaches out and grabs Alex around the neck
There is a loud bang on the door as the blind man tries to break in
There are several more loud bangs
A hand grabs Rocky around the face
Alex is shot as he opens the door
The dog jumps at the window once more
The blind man comes into view behind Rocky
The professor suddenly grabs Edna by the mouth with chloroform
Turnbull looks up and the camera quickly pans to reveal the ghost girl standing outside the car window
As the camera pans up from a woman’s feet, it cuts to a different screaming woman just before it gets to her face
Terry spots a corpse in the water which startles her
The corpse’s head suddenly turns towards Terry
While walking through the darkness, the tortured girl suddenly comes into Terry’s view
In a recap of the first movie, a drowned Jason comes out of the water and grabs Alice
A cat jumps in through the window
One of the campers scares the others by disguising himself into a masked killer
A hand holding a hammer suddenly appears and hits the police officer
Mark gets hit by a machete and falls down the stairs
Jason comes up from under the sheets
Jason stands up facing Ginny
Jason’s hand breaks through the window
A pitchfork breaks through the door
Jason starts reaching into the car
Jason leaps toward her as she’s running away
Jason jumps in through the window and grabs Ginny
Hayley puts a bag over Jeff’s head
A corpse on a gurney sits up
Box 27 is opened, revealing the body of the man who was recently murdered
The guillotine blade drops
Professor Jarod’s face peels away
A woman bends down to feed her cat when a man (unseen from the waist up) grabs her
In the basement, Andy looks at a box on the table when Mr Leemus suddenly appears behind him
Mr Leemus grabs Andy around the neck as he leaves the basement
The small lizard is suddenly grabbed and eaten by a different, much larger type of lizard
When Jonas looks to his left, the megalodon suddenly appears next to the submersible
Someone grabs Jonas by the shoulder
A previously unseen large eel suddenly leaps at the character’s helmet, shown from his POV
A shoal of fish startles the characters
A lizard suddenly appears in front of Jonas, shown from his POV, and lunges at him
The megalodon rams the glass wall behind the speaking character, shattering it
A megalodon suddenly appears and swallows the boat with the mercenaries
Something rams the boat, startling its passengers
As the cameraman slowly looks around the garage, he sees the landlord standing in the darkness and reaching out for him
While the cameraman walks through the dark alleyway, a pane of glass shatters by itself

The opening scene involves the camera slowly zooming in on the trunk of a parked car while Christmas music plays. Suddenly, the trunk lock pops out and we see a woman’s eye and this is accompanied by a very loud sound effect. [Video]
Angela bumps into a security guard as she walks around a corner
As Angela enters the security office a dog barks at her
Angela trips over something on the floor
Angela looks at her phone and the light from it reveals Thomas standing right behind her. [Video]
The dog barks at Angela once more as she enters the office
As the lift opens, Angela sees Thomas watching her from behind a door
A dead body falls into the flooded lift
Angela sees the policeman on the security camera, she then turns around but Thomas is standing right behind her. [Video]
The dog jumps through a broken window into the car that Angela is hiding in
The apparently dead dog suddenly barks at Angela
Angela appears behind Thomas after he opens a locker door
Angela turns the car on and loud heavy metal music plays on the radio
A car smashes into Angela’s car
Angela suddenly stabs Thomas in the eye
Thomas grabs Angela around the ankle
Hannibal’s sudden reappearance and subsequent attack on Will may startle some viewers
An image of some dolls briefly flashes on the screen accompanied by a high pitched whooshing noise
Hannibal lunges towards Will (but is stopped by the chain holding him)
A hand comes out of the van to grab Freddy
The Tooth Fairy suddenly puts his hands over Freddy’s face. [Video]
A man looks up and sees Hannibal standing right in front of him
The phone rings during a scene transition
Laura screams and falls back in her chair
The camera flashes to Laura on the ground with a loud soundtrack noise
Trevor speaks from offscreen and Rose drops her wine glass
The home security alarm goes off and Rose drops her glass
The phone rings suddenly
The phone rings suddenly again
Rose awakens abruptly from a nightmare
The demon abruptly screams at Rose during a tense scene
The camera cuts to a smiling partygoer standing very close to Rose with an accompanying sound effect
The demon screams Rose’s name and the scene abruptly changes
The scene cuts to a mangled cadaver
Holly’s head unnaturally drops from her shoulders and dangles in front of the car window
The demon grabs Rose’s face and proceeds to scream
The doctor knocks on Rose’s car window, startling her
The camera cuts back to the doctor who is now replaced by a smiling Carl with blood dripping from his mouth
Rose’s mother yells her name
The demon grabs the door that Rose is trying to close
The demon appears behind Rose and throws her against the wall
Joel begins running at Rose with an associated loud sound effect
Rose turns to see she is back at her childhood home
The little girl suddenly turns around with blood all over her
Because Sissy is lost in her thoughts, she hits a kangaroo with the car
Sissy stares at the creepy painting and therefore gets scared by Alex coming in
Alex grabs the phone and looks around as she discovers the dead body of Jamie in the grass
Sissy starts hitting herself with her phone
After removing a few towels from under the bed, Emma finds Tracey’s corpse
While Emma is trying to process what happened, Sissy appears in the door behind her
Tom has some visions of a girl while he is by the fridge
Tom sits up on the couch and turns on the TV, when he lies back down on the couch, there is a girl sitting next to him. [Video]
Jake suddenly begins talking while Debbie is listening on the baby monitor
Someone runs up some stairs beside Maggie while she is walking down a dark alley
The dead girl can be seen in the medicine cabinet mirror as Maggie closes it
Maggie walks past the dead girl in the basement
Someone grabs Tom and he has a series of visions while Lisa is hypnotizing him
A decomposed body is shown close up on screen, accompanied by a screaming noise
Harry grabs Maggie
After a long moment of silent tension, The Riddler lunges at the man with a roar
While Batman and Catwoman are looking into the trunk, loud gunshots suddenly hit the car
In the wide angle shot, someone suddenly appears in the foreground, accompanied by a scare chord
Batman is startled by a cop who is guarding the crime scene
One of the ghost kids suddenly appears (loud noise, during a pan to the right
One of the ghost kids is floating in the air (cut, loud noise
When the kid is cycling, suddenly the ghost kids appear (cut, loud noise
The camera is zoomed in on a sleeping woman’s face, then suddenly cuts to a zoomed out shot to reveal Paul whispering something into her ear, accompanied by a loud sound
During a very misty scene in which almost nothing is visible, the empty man suddenly comes into view right in front of the camera and attacks Davara
There is a sudden cut and a screech during a flashback
James looks out into the hallway and sees a shadowy figure that suddenly springs up to reveal that it’s the empty man
There is a sudden cut to the empty man screeching and running towards the camera
Jim kicks The Hitcher out of the moving car
A metal sign falls over with a loud bang
As Jim turns to leave, The Hitcher appears
Jim’s car is suddenly rear-ended
The sound of tires screeching followed by a truck smashing through the closed garage door
A car rushes by on the highway
The Hitcher shoots one of the police officers
The Hitcher bangs his hand on the underside of the table and says ‘bang’
A gunshot
A gunshot
A gunshot
Loud music suddenly comes on
A door is loudly pushed open
A loud voice can be suddenly heard from a scanner radio
The man behind the camera hits the little girl with it
Ed hits the driving man with something
The lights turn on to reveal Ed’s reflection in the window, startling Tim
There is a loud cut to a dead body
An eye appears in the man’s belongings
A man appears in front of the camera
Banging from the coffin knocks things over
Mr. Edwards turns around
Hayley looks around with the camera and a severed hand moving around on its own causes her to scream
Hayley looks up from the ground and Mr. Edwards is running straight at her
One of the soldiers reaches out for the woman who quickly grabs him on the arm
There is a sudden loud noise during a quiet scene as someone gets attacked in another room
The police officer appears behind her
The subject runs into frame and rams into the soldier from the side
A strange creature eats a man’s face
The creature reappears
A hand reaches under the door
A hand bursts through the glass
Some fireworks are let off, interrupting a conversation in a nearby car
A man is suddenly shot in a car
A sudden cut to a man firing a gun at a shooting range may startle some viewers
Maxine is looking at the kitchen, when the old lady appears behind her
As Maxine is running through the grass away from the house, Wayne suddenly grabs her
After RJ starts driving, the old woman appears in front of the car
Something is pushed through the hole in the wall, Wayne is looking through
After Lorraine pulls the trigger for the lightbulb, there is a sudden cut to Wayne getting the spikes pulled out of his head
Lorraine turns on the light and the naked, cuffed body of RJ is shown
Howard suddenly appears in front of Jackson
Maxine realizes who is laying next to her and screams
Bobby-Lynn opens the door and sees the old woman running towards her
While Lorraine is trying to unlock the door, her hand gets smashed by the owner of the house
The woman slaps Bobby-Lynn after she’s trying to help her
Bobby-Lynn is thrown into the lake
A crocodile attacks Bobby-Lynn
Lorraine jumps up from behind the door and screams
When Lorraine runs out of the house, she gets shot from the side
